todos.title: Create todos data store
todos.description: Add data/todos.json and lib/todos.ts utilities to read/write todos persistently.

todos.title: Build TODO web page
todos.description: Create routes/todo.tsx page to render current todo list with daisyUI styles.

todos.title: Implement todos API
todos.description: Add REST endpoints under routes/api/todos for list/create/update/delete.

todos.title: Add interactive island
todos.description: Create islands/TodoList.tsx to toggle status and add items via fetch to API.

todos.title: Sync tool todos to file
todos.description: Ensure future manage_todo_list updates also write to data/todos.json to keep page in sync.
